caption: Suri: “In 2018, we have already announced over 10 customer engagements on #5G, bringing us to a total of more than 50 trials and launches. And we are just getting started." #MWC18
Our CMO Barry French didn't shy away from a bet of making this the best #MWC18 ever. Now #teamNokia is boldly working towards making him go bald, branded Nokia blue. #teamnokiaCMOchallenge
Swipe your way through some fun highlights of our Nokia City at #MWC18 and head over to our Facebook to take a live tour!

#geek alert: This robot showcases how we use #5G for automation to power the 4th Industrial Revolution. The tactile internet allows us to feel materials in real time on one location and actually sense and touch a material even if we are not in the factory. #industry40 #robotics #MWC18
Our @metykotb demonstrates the Ultra Compact Network at #MWC18 while wearing the Connected Jacket which picks up vital signs and has built-in #gps monitoring. #publicsafety #firstresponders

The future of #digitalcity and the future of machine augmented intelligence demonstrated by Nokia Bell Labs at #MWC18. #AI #drones
#teamnokia is having a wonderful time at #MWC18 in Barcelona! Swipe for a selection of fun photos  from our crew party yesterday.
Nokia is lighting the way to a new approach, taking optical networking to the limit of physics with our new Photonic Service Engine 3 (PSE-3) chipset. nokia.ly/PSE-3
Artificial intelligence enhances everyday life in many ways. Have you already noticed how useful it can be? #OurFansRock #artificialintelligence
Earlier today our #NokiaHackathon event featured 2 of these micro #FPV quads flown around by specialists while the teams of #hackers were working around the topic of #5G

Today we launch our Nokia ReefShark chipsets that deliver massive performance gain in #5G networks. Our chipsets leverage in-house silicon expertise to dramatically reduce the size, cost and power consumption of operators’ networks and meet the massive compute and radio requirements of 5G.

Today we launched an industrial #5G trial with @deutschetelekom and @hamburgerhafen, testing network slicing, traffic management, data processing, virtual reality applications and more. Check out how our Nokia #5G ready antenna, a key component of the 5G test network is being installed on top of the Hamburg TV tower #iiot

Our newly launched ReefShark chipsets leveraging in-house #silicon expertise combine power, intelligence and efficiency to make them ideally suited to be at the heart of fast arriving #5G networks. http://nokia.ly/ReefShark #AI
With 5G, the world will be closer. #OurFansRock #5G
At Nokia, we create the technology to connect the world. Meet us at #MWC18 in Barcelona to find out how! nokia.com/mwc #5G
#Gaming just got faster! We have tested the #5G gaming experience with @teliafinland over a test 5G network at our Nokia 5G Innovation Lab. #esports

Snow geese at Mount Baker in Washington State, U.S., captured in flight by one of our employees Huiyu who enjoys nature photography. Wishing our fans and followers a happy and relaxing weekend! Photo credit: Huiyu Tao
#teamnokia Hangzhou held its annual party for all employees to celebrate the old year's achievements and get ready for the new year's challenges.

Know your nights. Master your days. Introducing Nokia Sleep, an advanced sleep sensing and home automation pad that features in-depth sleep cycle analysis, snore detection, and heart rate tracking. Thanks to an IFTTT integration, use Nokia Sleep to help automate your home and life like never before -- shut off the lights when you climb into bed or even turn on the heater when you wake up. Follow @nokiahealth for more!

#KnowYourself #sleep #sleepsmarter #sleepscore #newyear #newyearsresolution #goals #healthy #nokia #TeamSleep #progress #healthyliving

Nokia #smallcells – putting you ahead of the game. Flexible, compact and cost-effective, they can meet the needs of all your customers, connecting the city with your network, your services.

The Nokia Customer Success management team came together in a creative environment in our training center in Finland to discuss how to add value to our customers and develop new engagement models. They also learned about #MachineLearning #5G and #IoT. Photo credit: Leena Ollitervo
The #connectedcar of the future will come with 4 wheels, #5G and a whole new user experience for drivers, passengers and pedestrians. Read more in our new blog post: http://nokia.ly/ConnectedCarsBlog

Greetings from the World Economic Forum in beautiful #Davos. Our CEO Rajeev Suri discussed the topic of Transforming Health in the Fourth Industrial Revolution and our Chairman Risto Siilasmaa held a keynote at the Cyber Future Dialogue. #WEF18 #industry40 #cybersecurity #digitalhealth
Check out this #rubikscube solving gadget from our Garage opening in our Espoo headquarters - a new co-working space for #learning and #innovation

The future of #collaboration and co-creation comes from #data sharing in an ecosystem approach across industries - we celebrate the Open Ecosystem Network turning 1 year old! open-ecosystem.org #innovation

Yesterday our Finnish offices celebrated the 100th anniversary of independent Republic of Finland. Nokia, 152 years old, was delighted to invite this youngster called Finland amongst us centenarians. Swipe for more photos! #suomi100 #finland100 #BragForFinland @suomifinland100

'Tis the season for giving! All December long, @nokiahealth is giving you the #GiftOfHealth! With a different #gift every day, be on the lookout across @nokiahealth’s Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter pages! #holidays #giftgiving #wellness #health
Nokia's got talent! #teamNokia at our Chennai site put on an amazing show for their WOW 2017 event showcasing a wide variety of professional and entertaining performances.

Our Rajeev Suri explains at the Nokia Global Analyst Forum why we lead in #5G: #innovation, an unbeatable #5G product range, #AI & #machinelearning, our e2e portfolio, and our ability to enable the business. #NokiaIAR

Yesterday Nokia Bell Labs announced its prestigious Bell Labs Prize, with a first place awarded to Kaushik Sengupta for pioneering the first truly universal software defined reconfigurable mmWave.

We held the 19th edition of our annual Nokia Quality Awards in Espoo, Finland. Warm congratulations to our winners for excellence in customer execution, #safety, #security & #sustainability and our suppliers! Dare to think big!

A group of children from Espoo, Finland, visited #Santa’s workshop in Lapland using our #OZO Live #virtualreality solution. The broadcast was delivered from Lapland to a #5G network at the Nokia Campus - a great example of the possibilities of #5G technology as it enables new services and experiences.

Our Noida and Chennai (India) sites just opened GameZone, a playground with the newest technologies for all employees to enjoy together. #VR is enabling quarterly leagues between the various #teamnokia cross borders. Fun guaranteed!

Nokia Germany is holding Innovation Days in Munich, Stuttgart, Ulm and Nuremberg on 13-14 November. The focus of these events is on local eco-systems for developing use cases and solutions for #5G and #IoT. Designed to expect the unexpected! This single 2.4 Tb/s line card with our revolutionary FP4 silicon chip inside could be enough for all the internet traffic of a country the size of Belgium. #BBWF

Our Cairo site hosted #IEEEXtreme, an @ieeeorg programming challenge where teams of students across the globe compete in a 24-hour time span against each other to solve programming problems. Nokia solves all the in-home #WiFi challenges: performance, coverage, device onboarding. It’s time to become faster, better and smarter with #IntelligentAccess #BBWF

Lights, camera, action! Our #innovation in the spotlight at the opening of our brand new Nokia Skypark in Budapest. With #FutureXDays kicking off, renowned researchers and educators will give us a glimpse into the future.
Hands-on learning with holograms? Yes, please! @mr_gustavco is demonstrating the use of augmented reality in customer documentation at #FutureXDays #AR #innovation

Today we introduced our new Ultra Compact Network - the #LTE network that can be deployed in places where network connectivity has been lost. Our Ultra Compact Network brings instant broadband connectivity for first responders and business critical users. #publicsafety
Today we welcome 200 girls to our campus in Espoo, Finland for a day of interactive, hands-on fun using Science, Technology, Engineering and Math (STEM) #STEM
We're excited to take part in the European Advanced Networking Test Center's Multi-Vendor Interoperability Showcase around #innovations in the Software-Defined Network (SDN) area.
Small actions can make a big difference. Here are some ways to save energy - share your own tip in the comments! #EarthHour #sustainability

What's your favorite place in #Finland? Share it with @100moodsfinland and it might be shared with the world in 360° video created with Nokia #OZO! Hurry - the last day to submit is 31 March! Visit 100moods.com to submit it now!

Nokia Ultra Compact Network in the spotlight during our #MWC17 Facebook live. A rapidly deployable solution for critical communications and enterprises which can be carried in a backpack and is able to establish coverage and connectivity in remote areas in minutes.
Our research shows steady rise in mobile device infection rates. Download the latest Nokia Threat Intelligence Report on our website – you can find the link in our bio. #cybersecurity #TIL
The code retreat held at our Manila Technology Center brought together local students interested in #technology. They learned about Test-Driven Development and Four Rules of Simple Design.

Our Chairman Risto Siilasmaa attended the state dinner reception hosted by H.E. Sauli Niinistö, President of Finland to welcome H.E. Xi Jinping, President of the People’s Republic of China and his wife Madame Peng Liyuan to Finland on 5 April in Helsinki. China is one of Nokia’s most important markets; the company has operated in the country since 1985. Sales in 2016 were some 2.7 billion euros.
Get on the field! #OZO is live streaming @HKSevens tournament in #VR all weekend long to fans in Hong Kong! #hk7s #wheretheworldcomestoplay #rugby
Terve! #Finnish is as beautiful as it is challenging. Here's a little something to help you join the conversation.
Our #5G engineer Sakhira vlogs about her day in our Paris-Saclay site. Head over to our LinkedIn page to view the video and find out more about Nokia as an employer. #womeninSTEM #vlog
Nokia colleagues from Japan to Hungary connect virtually under the blooming cherry blossoms to celebrate spring. #sakura #hanami #cherryblossom
The entrance to our demo area at #MWC17 - the gateway to #innovation. For more: nokia.com/mwc
We're at the GTI Summit 2017 at #MWC17 bringing together the industry’s most influential decision makers to shape the future of 4G evolution and #5G.
Our Nokia Bell Labs race car demo illustrates how low latency can result in sluggish vehicle response + multi-car pileups. Lucky they are only toys. #MWC17
Did you hear? @NokiaMobile is on Instagram! Follow them for all the latest on the Nokia 3, 5, 6 & the brand new 3310.
Isn't it shiny? Check out our GSMA Glomo Award for our end-to-end #IoT solution!
Check out our stadium experience powered by Nokia #5G FIRST. #MWC17
#Teamnokia celebrating a stellar #MWC17. Greetings from our booth!
Check out this miniature rotating assembly line with our ABB robot, Frida at the our stand at #MWC17.
Bye bye Barcelona - can't wait to be back for #MWC18!
This morning István Tóth (Lead network operations business manager) and Béla Zagyva (Country senior officer) welcomed the women of Nokia with flowers at our Budapest site #IWD #teamnokia
Ester Navarro demonstrates how a shared data layer makes customer networks cloud native at #MWC17
The right thing to do: our CEO Rajeev Suri has signed the Women's Empowerement Principles. #WEPs @globalcompact @unwomen
Our site in Chennai, India, recently organized a 21 km long cycling rally to raise awareness for road safety. #teamnokia
Nokia Saving Lives is one of the finalists in @UAE4GoodAwards in Dubai with #drones to facilitate efficient rescue operations for first responders.
Making others feel good never goes out of style. Here are some ways to show affection with the help of technology. #randomactsofkindness
Our worldwide #IoT network grid (WING) will provide seamless IoT connectivity across technologies and geographical borders for e.g.: connected cars or freight containers.  #MWC17
Get through cold and flu season with the award winning @withings Thermo. Track temperature readings, get reminders, and input related symptoms/medications right on your smartphone. #digitalhealth
Only 2 more days to go and #MWC17 is taking off! Follow all our channels for real-time updates.
From 1PM CET, Nokia press and analyst update at #MWC17. Not in Barcelona? Here's our livestream: http://nokia.ly/2l7QuJN
Our #5G FIRST solution will allow operators to rapidly address the huge demands of connected people and industries. #MWC17
Our CEO Rajeev Suri today outlined on how we deliver on our strategy to lead in #5G, #IoT and #Cloud, and tap new growth markets.
This is how our @tekoski is preparing for #MWC17 to stay fresh for the show! #swimrunning #teamnokia
3200 square meters of awesomeness. Our booth is buzzing at #MWC17.
It's showtime at #MWC17! Come visit us at Hall 3A10 or head over to Facebook for a live tour.

@Withings, part of Nokia, announced the launch and availability of several new smart products at the 2017 Consumer Electronics Show, two of which have won prestigious CES Innovation Awards! #Congratulations! #CES2017

Proud to be awarded Gold Class distinction for our performance in RobecoSAM's #Sustainability Yearbook 2017 and to figure amongst the 20 most #sustainable corporations in #corporateknight #global100 ranking.

We are delighted to become the main global sponsor for the HundrED project, which seeks the most inspiring innovations in education and aims to spread them globally. The project is part of Finland's centenary anniversary celebrations.  @suomifinland100

Today we hosted a #Hackathon in Espoo, Finland, bringing together security experts from information security solution companies, universities and other organizations that share a common passion for IT and network security.
This little drone's live video feed was projected to the big screen so hackers can 'spy' on other teams.
Can you spot all the solar panels on the rooftops? Nokia modernizes the Smart Grid to bring power distribution networks into the #IoT era.
Out on the town with #OZO in Park City at #Sundance! Follow @NokiaVR on Twitter for all of the action from last week.
Join us at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona 27 Feb - 2 March! #5G #IoT #Cloud #MWC17
More people, places and things are connecting to the network than ever before. We extended our #Cloud Packet Core to address increasing connectivity needs and to enable a path to #5G. #MWC17
We had students participate in a LEGO® SERIOUS PLAY® workshop on intrapreneurship and #leadership. They got to build a vision for themselves inside a team and for projects.

The Nominees for the GSMA's Global Mobile Awards 2017 - the industry’s leading stage for innovation, excellence and achievement – have been announced. We're excited to be shortlisted in four categories. #MWC17
On the path to #5G: we launch new features that will maximize operators' resources, speed up deployment times, and cut power and costs especially in the most densely populated locations. #MWC17
We're loving technology for good. Happy #Valentines. #maketechhuman #thatslove
Nokia is at #Slush16 in Helsinki! We had time for a quick selfie with our OZO before opening our booth. Come and meet us in Hall 7 if you are there.
At #Slush16 in Helsinki, where start-ups are in residence, we are busy discussing how we can co-create solutions for the Internet of Things using the new Nokia Innovation Platform.
It was a crowded house and the view from our stand was just spectacular at #Slush16
Our fan says cities should be built environmentally friendly. We agree – and let’s make them smarter and safer, too. #OurFansRock

Nokia and The Humanitarian Cooperative used virtual reality to show the impact of the ongoing Syrian refugee crisis through a new lens and to support the efforts of The United Nations Refugee Agency. Watch the trailer here: http://nokia.ly/2hnO6NC #UNHCR
This picture with Arlene Ducao and Ilias Koen preparing for the Nokia Open Innovation Challenge finals is perfect for starting the week in good spirits!
#SeasonsGreetings to all our followers!
With 9 of our most liked photos in 2016 we'd like to thank you for all the Instagram love you showed us! See you all next year! :)
Thanks for connecting the world with us this year. Let’s keep shaping the future of technology in 2017! #newyearseve
#OZO is capturing the farewell address of @barackobama in #360video for @vrscout. Watch history happen live at 6PM PST today: nokia.ly/2iYwNEB
Proud that our CLO Maria Varsellona has been recognized by Etisphere as one of the Attorneys Who Matter in 2016 http://nokia.ly/2j9OAsq

Digital divide is real with 53% of the world’s population offline. We need to join forces to make sure the gap is reduced and no one is left behind in the transition to the Programmable World. At World Economic Forum in Davos, Rajeev Suri leads the discussion how to finance ICT infrastructure to connect the unconnected. #wef17 #ICT4SDG

Congratulations to all the finalists of the Nokia Open Innovation Challenge! We were looking for the next big ideas on the Internet of Things this year and, needless to say, the finals were a day of inspiration and excitement. #IoT #innovation
We’re building a world where everyone and everything is connected. Great to see our fans are on the same wavelength with us. #OurFansRock
Inspired talk at Nokia Open Innovation Challenge – first prize winners Kasparas Rudokas (left) and Einaras von Gravrock presenting their work during a demo tour. #innovation #IoT

Nokia Open Innovation Challenge was double the fun for Shadi Saberi and Maryam Ziaei-Moayyed – in addition to coming in second in the competition, their concept won the Investor’s Choice award as well. #innovation #IoT
Rajeev Suri spoke about innovation and company culture at the Nikkei Global Management Forum in Tokyo. “Nokia is well placed to turn uncertainty into opportunity,” our CEO said.

The third prize in the Nokia Open Innovation Challenge went to Mobagel for their Decanter(TM) Big Data AI engine. Considering the buzz they created in the competition, Joyce and Adms must feel like winners. #innovation #IoT

CEO Rajeev Suri discussed the company vision at our Capital Markets Day event in Barcelona: “Nokia is extremely well-positioned to win in its primary market with service providers. We aim to target superior returns through focused growth into adjacent markets where high-performance, end-to-end networks are increasingly in demand.” #NokiaCMD16

Carlijn Adema from our Global Services marketing team explaining the Nokia AVA platform, the adoption of robotics and how we’re entering a new era of delivering network services. #NokiaCMD16 #innovation
Our corporate social media team got together to discuss the tools of the trade - both #IoT and social. Can you guess which Nokia products they're holding? #teamnokia
Thumbs up! Adms Chung and Joyce Hung from Mobagel (above) and Claire Tsai, Carson Chen and Alan Tsai form iXensor were in high spirits at the Nokia Open Innovation Challenge finals.
Our Tampere office hosted 90 excited children last week as they got to explore their parents’ workplace! #teamnokia
Today in Espoo, we hosted the Nokia #5G Enterprise Summit. We presented various demos and engaged around the topics of 5G and #innovation with over 100 visitors.
Tech is all about the human possibilities of the connected world, and our fans know it. #OurFansRock
If you made a movie with #OZO, we would be first in line to see it. #OurFansRock
When two experts get together, expect an insightful discussion. Executive vice president and head of North America Ricky Corker meets with @sprint CEO Günther Ottendorfer in Kansas City.  #networking

We won four awards at CTIA Super Mobility last week, including Crowd Favorite! On top of that, our CEO Rajeev Suri gave a keynote speech at the event. The future of #5G seems brighter than ever. #CTIA2016 #SuperMobility

Our goal is to innovate technologies that improve and even save people's lives. The 'Nokia Saving Lives' event on our Espoo campus gathered different teams to showcase the collaboration between public safety, innovation steering and corporate social responsibility.
Our Kathrin Buvac meeting someone she regards as “one of the most inspiring leaders and women in tech” – Megan Smith, chief technology officer of the United States.
Setting up a new laboratory in Poland proved that teamwork goes a long way. Making tech human starts from tech built by humans.
It's #TeachersDay, a time to honor our educators. A fan reminded us about a very important lesson: never stop learning. #OurFansRock

Virtual reality can take you anywhere, and sometimes even the tools of the trade get to visit exciting places. Here’s #OZO enjoying a Harvard University computer sciences lecture by professor David Malan. Photo by Aleksandr Babii. #education #vr

Innovation is no laughing matter, but it always inspires lively conversation. Markus Borchert (right) discusses 5G and the Internet of Things with attendees at The Gigabit Society event we hosted in Brussels. #teamnokia

This is not your average trekking gear. Michael Kiessner demonstrates the Nokia Ultra Compact Network which establishes broadband connectivity in minutes – ideal for setting up temporary coverage during emergencies. #publicsafety #LTE

Yesterday, at the Nokia Quality Awards, our colleagues were rewarded for outstanding achievements in quality in three categories: Customer Excellence, Performance Excellence, and Safety Excellence. Quality is a key differentiator in our industry and we were proud to celebrate our shining stars for their outstanding achievements.
Founder of Climb for Memory @nelzor took our #OZO up #MtEverest recently to raise awareness for Alzheimer's disease. Thanks for bringing us along for the climb to #EndAlz.
Throwback to our Open Innovation Challenge last year. #Innovators remember to apply to the 2016 challenge by 15 August! #NokiaOpenInnovation #IOT #NokiaGrowthPartners #TBT
Vaida Ska from @mgomd thinks VR can make big dreams a reality. #VirtuallyHere #OZO
"#VR is a blank playbook, and whatever you want to create is up to the brand” Vaida Ska, @mgomd #VirtuallyHere #OZO

Ask a Finn about sauna and you'll get a different answer every time. For some it's about the steam, others relaxation. Then there are those that just love the heat. That's probably why they need so many!
There’s a lot of excitement around #VR, but will it deliver? Matt Littler from Brandwidth thinks so, what do you think? #VirtuallyHere
Today is the perfect day to get together with your friends, hang out and have fun. Tag your best friend to let them know you care!
We all have those special things we like to do every summer. Here are a few activities our fans enjoy. #OurFansRock
They say that Finland is the land of a thousand lakes. From Saimaa to Inarijärvi, the easy-going life by the lakeside has always had a special place in every Finns' heart.
Only five days left to apply to the Nokia Open Innovation Challenge! The winners of last year’s competition wish you luck! #IoT #innovation
Yesterday’s #RunFest2016 was a success. Congrats to our team for taking home the win! #teamnokia

#OZO got a great reception at the CS50 class at @harvard, lead by Professor David Malan. Can’t wait to see what these bright minds create in virtual reality in the future. #VR #CS50 (Photo credit: Arturo Real)
Congrats to our Jane Rygaard and Kathrin Buvac on being featured in the ’50 women to watch in 2016’ list by Global Telecoms Business!

“Brands have to start experimenting [with virtual reality] now, today. Because the sooner they get used to using the technology, the sooner creatives will understand how to merge the content with the technology. It’s better to be an early adopter.” Reggy Mortier, Barco. #VirtuallyHere #OZO
Our CEO Rajeev Suri meeting with Austrian chancellor Christian Kern to discuss the digital economy.
We've had a great time at Mobile World Congress Shanghai. Thanks for everyone popping by our stand! #MWCS16
Protecting the environment starts with lots of small eco-friendly actions. A good reminder from our fan!
“For the tourism industry, #VR is a great opportunity.” Arne Brekenfeld, @metadesignbe #VirtuallyHere #OZO
Last week we took part in the #5GWorld event, exploring the future transfer from LTE to 5G. Here's a highlight from our Head of Media Relations, @simonpoulter!
We hope that your summer is getting off to a good start! Did you know that every Finn enjoys up to 14L of ice cream per year, more than any European country! What’s your favorite ice cream flavor?
Filmmaker @memewala believes #VR will change the way we see the world around us. What do you think? #VirtuallyHere #OZO
"The biggest potential of VR is as an empathy machine.” @memewala, filmmaker. #VirtuallyHere #OZO
We are constantly on the move, both in and out of the office. This time, we gathered our colleagues in France for a Movin’ Day. It was full of colour and packed with activities.
#VR is all about storytelling, says Ami Hasan from hasan & partners. Do you agree? #VirtuallyHere #OZO

Nokia leaders and key influencers in the health and wellness industry discuss the future of digital health and the role that technology can play in improving lives at our San Francisco office opening. Our panel included Cedric Hutchings, head of digital health at Nokia Technologies, Chris Winter, president/Owner at Charlottesville Neurology and SleepMedicine, Malay Gandhi, partner at Ensemble Labs and former CEO of Rock Health, and Christine Lemke, chief product officer at Evidation Health.
Virtual reality demos powered by #OZO brought smiles to faces at our San Francisco office opening. We hope to see similar reactions at our stand during #CannesLions.
We're enjoying the atmosphere and welcoming #CannesLions attendees to check out our #OZO demos!

The crowd at #CannesLions is exploring why brands should get excited about virtual reality. Here, Matt Littler suggests that VR will offer a new and different type of connection to brands. #virtuallyhere
Dean Johnson shares his thoughts on how VR helps marketers extend their reach. #CannesLions #virtuallyhere #OZO
Another day at #CannesLions, and more #VR experiences to share. If you're here, come say hi! #OZO
We've enjoyed the great discussions on #VR and reactions to #OZO and look forward for more! #CannesLions

Lights, camera, action! #OZO gets ready for a photo shoot at #CannesLions.
"The perfect brand experience doesn't feel like a brand experience." Hans Lee, Sticky. #CannesLions #VirtuallyHere #OZO
It’s Midsummer in Finland – time to slow down and enjoy the sauna, bonfires and the night when the sun never sets.
"The perfect brand experience in #VR is the one that feels right for the brand." Amanda Malko, Tongal. #CannesLions #VirtuallyHere #OZO
How do you celebrate May Day, or "Vappu," like a Finn? By putting on your graduation hat and getting together with friends for a picnic in the park. Hauskaa Vappua!
A fan described IoT as a world where everything is connected. A grand vision for the future! #ourfansrock
How to spark employee innovation? Through Nokia Garage, an innovative workspace aiming to shrink the distance between ideas and working prototypes.
Happy #MothersDay! The perfect day for sharing a hug and spending time together.
#TelecommunicationDay celebrates the importance of communication and how information travels around the world. Let's connect!
We had the chance to introduce the First Lady of Japan, Akie Abe, to a VR experience at Slush Asia!
We had a great time attending Slush Asia in Tokyo this month, introducing attendees to our #OZO camera and immersing them in virtual reality. Have you experienced VR yet?
#OZO captures Nokia Technologies president Ramzi Haidamus in 3D VR on the red carpet at the Alice Through the Looking Glass premiere at the El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood. #ThroughTheLookingGlass
Our fans saw increased awareness of their personal health as one of the main benefits from wearables. We agree! #ourfansrock
Our chairman Risto Siilasmaa during his keynote speech at ICT Summit in Tokyo, Japan: “The laws of business are changing rapidly.”
“With improved performance month after month, I am proud of Nokia’s leadership,” our CEO Rajeev Suri says at #NokiaIAR.
“Today, we are back in the consumer space and we’re proud to have Withings with us.” - President of Nokia Technologies, Ramzi Haidamus, addressing the crowd at our new San Francisco office opening.
Finns don’t settle for just any kind of #Easter egg - it’s tradition to enjoy chocolate and nougat treats inside actual egg shells.
Our CEO Rajeev Suri kicking off a collaboration to continue making #Dubai the safest and smartest city in the world. #5G #SmartCity
We opened our doors and invited university students to our Solution Experience Centre in Espoo, #Finland to help broaden their understanding of digitalisation and it’s effect on society.

Choosing where to socialize online is like choosing where to meet your friends offline. One of our #fans would ideally want to hang out with all of them in one place. Well, online we all can. #ourfansrock
Want to have your say on the stories we share? We’d love to hear your feedback, so please fill in our survey to get involved. You’ll find the link in our bio.
Here's our Chairman Risto Siilasmaa enjoying the honor of meeting with the HRH Emir of Kuwait to discuss how technology can help humanity.
Planning a trip to #Finland? Here are some tips on how to speak like a local.
Innovation happens when risks are taken. “We should think more open-mindedly and long-term about possible futures," chairman Risto Siilasmaa says in an interview with Finnish magazine Image.

Imagine learning to code by making breakfast! Our colleagues in Athens creatively shared their expertise with local students through interactive games and magic tricks. Why? Because we believe in equipping and inspiring future tech influencers.
We’re having a great time at @NABshow presenting the Nokia #OZO which makes creating virtual reality experiences easier. That means there’ll be more immersive entertainment to enjoy!
Capturing a 360-degree view from above with the Nokia #OZO. The sky's the limit!
Our team enjoying the chance to introduce #GirlsinICT job perspectives with German Chancellor Angela Merkel in #Berlin.

The #OZO is ready to greet more #MWC16 attendees. Let's kick off day 3!
Big thanks from our #MWC16 team to everyone who visited our stand to experience what we're up to!
Last week in #Barcelona we took #VirtualReality to the streets and let people experience demos shot with the #OZO. Looks like this tester enjoyed what he saw!
Our team was thrilled to receive iF World Design Guide’s Gold Award for Product Design for their work on the Nokia #OZO. #goteam

We took to the streets of Barcelona to share how virtual reality feels like. We captured some fun reactions to experiences shot with the #OZO and can’t wait to share more of them with you! #VirtualReality #comingsoon

Our CEO Rajeev Suri has made his debut as Broadband Commissioner in UN’s initiative to use technology for sustainability and economic growth. Here he shares a laugh with Houlin Zhao, Secretary-General of ITU, the organisation leading the initiative. Picture credit: ITU
Congrats to our team for their award-winning Connected Car Project! Their work is all about improving road safety and preventing traffic jams. So long, rush hour stress.
We’re wishing everyone well on this #InternationalDayOfHappiness! Celebrate by sharing a #laugh with a friend and doing something you #enjoy.

Happy New Year! We hope 2016 is filled with adventure, happiness and lots of laughter. #happynewyear #2016
